title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 January 2015 - XWiki
content:
<Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
06:02 <Denis> has quit  
07:25 <cjd> has quit  
07:28 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
08:09 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:17 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:23 <vmassol> good morning  
08:27 <silverdrop> has joined #xwiki  
08:32 <cjd> has quit  
08:39 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
08:40 <msmeria> vmassol: sure  
08:40 <vmassol> thanks  
08:40 <msmeria> you're welcome  
08:40 <vmassol> btw if you can, it might be worth testing on oracle/pgsql after it works on mysql  
08:41 <vmassol> normally it should be fine but who knows...  
08:41 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:42 <msmeria> vmassol: ok, I will  
08:45 <vmassol> actually  
08:45 <vmassol> seems I need to make a modification for oracle  
09:08 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:14 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
09:15 <lyes> has joined #xwiki  
09:23 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
09:32 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
09:34 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:34 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
09:35 <lucaa> has quit  
09:35 <lucaa1> has joined #xwiki  
09:39 <vmassol> mflorea: good morning, what's your ETA. Today is supposed to be the final release day  
09:39 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: same question  
09:39 <vmassol> I personally need about 1/2 day more to finish something  
09:39 <gdelhumeau> I am waiting for Thomas  
09:39 <vmassol> you have 2 issues gdelhumeau  
09:39 <gdelhumeau> Thursday we were talking about a needed improvement in commons  
09:40 <vmassol> possibly 3  
09:40 <vmassol> with http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11445  
09:40 <vmassol> and we need something for this one: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11443  
09:41 <mflorea> vmassol: I've added a search suggest input for the tree (the input we used to have below the tree in the document index, and which is needed by the WYSIWYG editor). Now I need to integrate the result in the wysiwyg editor and update the functional tests. 1-2 days should be fine for me too.  
09:42 <vmassol> 1-2 days is a lot actually  
09:42 <vmassol> it means 3-4 days for the release  
09:42 <mflorea> I'll move the issues that I don't plan to do for 6.4 final  
09:42 <gdelhumeau> one more blocker: XWIKI-11670  
09:42 <vmassol> mflorea: for me it's half a day  
09:42 <vmassol> not 1 or 2 days ;)  
09:43 <vmassol> actually I probably only need 1 hour but I put half a day to be safe  
09:44 <mflorea> I need at least one day. But I can also commit the suggest and use it only in the document index for 6.4 final and do the wysiwyg integration in 6.4.1 in order to now delay the release.

13:09 <cjd> has quit  
13:11 <msmeria> has quit  
13:12 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:15 <msmeria> has quit  
13:15 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:33 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
13:44 <vmassol> tmortagne: are you working on anything for 6.4?  
13:45 <vmassol> we need someone to work on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11445 , maybe you could help?  
13:45 <vmassol> (for 6.4 since it's marked critcial for 6.')  
13:45 <vmassol> and http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11443 too  
13:46 <vmassol> I'd like to release 6.4 tomorrow if possible; it's going to be too late for today  
13:47 <vmassol> hopefully mflorea and gdelhumeau will have something ready for tomorrow  
13:47 <gdelhumeau\_> someone have any idea about: XWIKI-11655 ?  
13:48 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: AFAIR I handled webajr in HTML epxport laready in the past  
13:49 <vmassol> I remember adding code specific for that  
13:49 <vmassol> WebJarsExportURLFactoryActionHandler  
14:00 <gdelhumeau> it seems it is not the factory used  
14:05 <gdelhumeau> where this url factory is used? I don't see  
14:08 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: the factory is ExportURLFactory see my comment  
14:08 <vmassol> WebJarsExportURLFactoryActionHandler is not a URLFactory  
14:08 <vmassol> it's used by ExportURLFactory to provide specific handling for the webjar type  
14:36 <vmassol> still 6 blocker issues for 6.4: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11443?filter=13410&jql=category%20in%20(%22Top%20Level%20Projects%22)%20AND%20fixVersion%20in%20(%226.4%22)%20AND%20resolution%20in%20(Unresolved)  
14:36 <vmassol> wrong URL:  
14:36 <vmassol> good one: http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?filter=13410&jql=category%20in%20(%22Top%20Level%20Projects%22)%20AND%20fixVersion%20in%20(%226.4%22)%20AND%20resolution%20in%20(Unresolved)  
14:57 <vmassol> there are 6 extension tests failure: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension-6.4.x/lastBuild/testReport/  
14:58 <vmassol> could someone look at them please?  
14:58 <vmassol> and one on master: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/lastBuild/testReport/  
14:58 <vmassol> and one on 6.2.x: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension-6.2.x/lastBuild/testReport/
